name: Dmask
author: Gabbo
notes:
Skill is restart.
New trap card is incredible usefull in dhero, you can use it for kill 2 enemy monster or 1 enemy monster + 1 your monster if you, maybe, need another dhero in graveyard (or if enemy have just one monster and you need to kill it).
From the previous season I changed 1 trunade for 1 c.c., because amazones trap and archfields trap are incredible pesky for dhero.
